items.sentence: The doctor advised him to cut down on drinking.
The escaped prisoners are considered dangerous.
Tom is one of the rudest people I\'ve ever met.
Tom said he\'d be willing to try something new.
I\'m calling because I\'ve lost my credit card.
I couldn\'t help overhearing your conversation.
I couldn\'t think of anything better than that.
I have a feeling you\'ll be a very good lawyer.
I\'m confident that I\'ll win the tennis match.
I\'m going to ask for Tom Jackson\'s autograph.
I\'m going to make a cake for Mary\'s birthday.
It looks like we might have good weather today.

I\'ve got a lot of questions I need to ask you.
